description: It is understood he was shot after his firearm was taken from him near Castlerea Garda Station.
title: Garda officer Colm Horkan shot dead in County Roscommon
title_page: Garda officer Colm Horkan shot dead in County Roscommon - BBC News
maintext: Irish national broadcaster RTE says it understands Det Garda Horkan was on patrol in the town when he got out of his vehicle to engage with someone.
